1. Alibaba’s Jack Ma Wants AI to Serve, Not Lord Over, Humans  Bloomberg
  2. Alibaba founder Jack Ma calls for responsible AI in remarks to cloud unit  South China Morning Post
  3. Alibaba’s Jack Ma says AI should support humans, not replace them - report  Seeking Alpha
  4. Jack Ma: Tech Professionals Shouldn’t Let AI Replace Humans in Future, But Liberate, Understand, and Serve Them  AASTOCKS.com
  5. Use AI Responsibly, It Should Serve Humanity, Not Replace It: Alibaba's Jack Ma  Benzinga

item.title: Apps-from-prompts Firebase Studio is a great example – of why AI can't replace devs - theregister.com
item.description:
1. Apps-from-prompts Firebase Studio is a great example – of why AI can't replace devs  theregister.com
  2. Google introduces Firebase Studio, an end-to-end platform that builds custom apps in-browser, in minutes  VentureBeat
  3. Google takes on Cursor with Firebase Studio, its AI builder for vibe coding  BleepingComputer
  4. Devs Rejoice, Google’s New Firebase Studio Helps Build Agentic AI Apps  Analytics India Magazine
  5. Google Launches Firebase Studio, a Full-Stack AI App Builder in Your Browser  Maginative
